name: Nachiket Chavan
title: BCA Student | Aspiring Data Scientist & Full-Stack Developer
tagline: I love finding insights in data and building intelligent, real-world applications that connect information, logic, and people.
bio: BCA student at Sharanbasava University with a passion for Data Science and Full-Stack Development. I work with Python, JavaScript, and SQL to explore how data and AI power smarter systems. My focus: extracting insights from data while building efficient applications that merge logic with creativity.

timeline.title: Completed PUC Science
timeline.description: Built strong fundamentals in logic, problem-solving, and analytical thinking.

timeline.title: Started BCA Journey
timeline.description: Joined BCA at Sharanbasva University. Began coding with C, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Started building mini web projects and explored frontend + backend basics. Certified in MERN Stack, Programming in C & Java, and Data Science.

timeline.title: Smart India Hackathon & Advanced Projects
timeline.description: Participated in Smart India Hackathon 2025 (Digital Health Record System). Built Full-Stack Mobile App with React Native + Node.js + MySQL. Started learning Data Science seriously with Python, Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

careerGoals: Become a Data Scientist capable of handling real-world datasets and extracting insights through AI and machine learning.
As a secondary path, become a Full-Stack Developer skilled in scalable backend and interactive frontend systems.
Build AI-powered platforms that make learning, communication, and automation smarter and easier for everyone.
traits: Fast learner with attention to detail
Enjoys debugging and solving real-world tech problems
Balances academic learning with practical projects
interests: Learning new technologies and improving communication
